name: Zamalek vs. TP Mazembe 2020 NFT Ticket
description: A blockchain-immutable NFT representing a historic 2020 CAF Champions League match ticket between Zamalek (Egypt) and TP Mazembe (DR Congo). This ERC-721 token preserves a legendary moment in African football history with secure, decentralized ownership.
